description:
Lilith contacts Yuko in her dreams with vital information she must remember. After all, Yuko needs all the help she can get! Say, why is Momo helping her anyways?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Akumu ka Kichimu ka!? Yami no Door Stopper-san Kourin
Nightmare or Forebear?! The Doorstop of Darkness Descends
悪夢か吉夢か!? 闇のドアストッパーさん降臨
